attributes.action: please encourage car manufactures to start producing hydrogen powered vehicles and bring in new filling stations for them to fill up
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
hydrogen power is the future as oil and gas will soon run out and pollutes the atmosphere why wait we need the goverment to bring hyrogen powered vehicels into the uk with filling stations doted around the country

this would create jobs in the car industry and new jobs elswere to produce the hydrogen e.t.c

hydrgen is a lot better then electric for powering vehicels  much more reliable and realistic for the mad lives we live and it runs just like petrol at a similar price and the only emissions is water  nothing else
